name: Synth
description:
You were manufactured by one of the large robotics corporations using a combination of biological and robotic components. Then they added advanced AI inside a robotic brain. You are physically indistinguishable from a real human aside from identical bar codes under each eyelid.

Synths were first created off-world in 2130. Those created from this first batch are very rare and are the oldest known of their kind at 55 years old.

features.name: Ability Score Increase
features.description: You arenâ€™t human. In many respects you are better than human. Your Constitution score increases by 2.

features.name: Age
features.description: Synths are fully functioning adults at creation and appear to be in their early twenties. They age at a much slower rate than humans, but have a shortened lifespan. Even the most ancient synths tend to only look around 35 years old.

features.name: Bioenhanced
features.description: As a synth, you have advantage on checks to avoid disease.

features.name: Recharge
features.description: Instead of regular sleep, your enhancements allow you to sleep for just 4 hours a day and still gain the benefits of an 8 hour rest. Your AI produces the illusion of dreams for you in this state, usually of robot sheep.

features.name: Composite Weaving
features.description: Your skin and muscles are interwoven with high strength composite materials, granding you a natural armor of 13+your Dexterity modifier. Even when wearing armor your AC cannot be any lower than that of your natural armor.

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write English, and one other language of your choice.

suborigins.name: Manufacturer: Houston Dynamics M. IV
suborigins.description: For those who need more sophisticated security than a standard mech, Houston Dynamics offers the MK. IV Personal Security Synth.

suborigins.name: Shenzhen Solutions Paramour
suborigins.description: The Paramour by Shenzhen Solutions makes the ideal host, counter intelligence asset, or personal companion.

features.name: Ability Score Increase
features.description: You were built to deal with people, and emit pheromones that help you deal with people smoothly. Your People score increases by 1.

features.name: Inbuilt Charm
features.description: You have advantage on People (Persuasion) checks made to flatter, charm, or seduce.

suborigins.name: Visser Robotics Advanced Synth
suborigins.description: The Advanced Synth by Visser Robotics was designed to work in the colonies as cheap labor. They have enhanced strength and night vision.

features.name: Night Vision
features.description: You can see in dim light as if it were bright light, and darkness as if it were dim light up to a distance of 120ft.
